title: Overlord: Ple Ple Pleiades 4
content:
Well, well, well, if it isn't "Overlord: Ple Ple Pleiades 4" - the fourth installment of the Pleiades spin-off that literally nobody asked for. The art style is, surprise surprise, just like the previous seasons - not that anyone really cares. The character designs are bland, and the animation is nothing to write home about. But hey, at least they managed to keep the consistency going, right?

As for the story, well, there really isn't much of one. It's just a bunch of chibi characters running around doing random things, with no real overarching plot to tie it all together. But hey, who needs a coherentstoryline when you have cute, moe characters doing cute, moe things, right?

The only real saving grace of this series is the OST - it's decent enough to keep you from wanting to mute your speakers. But even then, it's not exactly memorable or groundbreaking. And let's not even get started on the voice acting - it's just as forgettable as the rest of the show.

Overall, "Overlord: Ple Ple Pleiades 4" is just more of the same - a mediocre spin-off that only the most hardcore "Overlord" fans will even bother watching. But hey, at least it's consistent in its mediocrity, right?
